title: Noam Chomsky with Christopher Hitchens 1992 Joint Interview
description:
In 1992, Noam Chomsky and Christopher Hitchens appeared together on a radio talk show. They discuss media and opening it up to public involvement.

Thank You For Dropping By. Like & Subscribe if you wish. Maybe it will be the kick in the butt I need as motivation to upload more gifts that lay waiting :)

Peace.
Enjoy!
